transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ha namaste bhaiya, good morning.
Customer: Ji sir, good morning boliye.
Executive: Vaibhav bol raha hu mai IndiaMART se manager.
Customer: Ha. Sir maine aapne jo photos bheji thi wo catalog pe to maine add kar diya.
But fir bhi sir na matlab kafi sare products aise hai sir jisme matlab bas ek hi do photos padi hai. Okay.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ha matlab mujhe sir catalog score 80% ke upar le jana hai, 80% karna hai catalog. Aap bolte ho na catalog improve karne rahe sir to wo mujhe karna hai sir aur but uske liye images required hongi sir kafi sari.
Executive: Achcha. Ha.
Customer: Jaise dekhna ek bar jo jo category add hai uski ek bar mai dekhta hu fir unka PNS kya kya pada hai images aapko bhejta hu. Aap please bhej dijiye. Hai na jaise wall water fountain ka koi image nahi pada hai. Indoor fountains mein ek photo missing hai. Aur sir ye sir thoda aur improve ho jayega agar aap sir ye matlab specification dalwa denge. To koi sir mere sath matlab koi aadhe ghante baith sakta hai kya matlab koi ek meeting kar sakta hai kya koi? Actually price wagera bhi dalni hai matlab aur jaise decorative fountain hai ab decorative fountain ka kya rate chal raha hai sir matlab man lijiye ki agar 4 feet ka hai to decorative fountain ka kya rate hai abhi?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Marble decorative fountain.
Executive: Iske andar jaise sand stone mein alag price hai, marble mein alag price hai. Sand stone wala jo ye brown lag raha hai ye brown mein hai brown color mein hai ye. Ha sand stone ka jaise 4 feet ka apan 35000 dal de fir wo party se baat karke wo jo bhi jo present design ke hisab se hoga.
Customer: Mai 40000 kar de raha fir customize hota hai wo buyer ko pata hota hai. Ha. Pata hai ye ki sir customization to hota hai.
Executive: Ye kya ek sand stone ka. Aur sir ye marble slabs ka kya rate chal raha hai?
Customer: Marble slab ka kaun sa marble hai isme?
Customer: Stone slab sorry stone slabs mein business karte hai ki nahi karte stone slabs mein?
Executive: Wo yellow color wala.
Customer: Nahi ye black color lag raha hai humko lag raha hai granite wagera hai ye ye. Matlab black stone slab jo kitchen mein lagta hai us type ka hai aapke paas kuch?
Executive: Wo abhi hata dijiye. Hata do na. Hmm. Ha hata dijiye.
Executive: Only makrana jo marble hai uska thik hai.
Customer: Hmm. Ha. Garden waterfall mein business hai aapka?
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Garden work. To images required hai sir aur price ka chaliye pehle puch leta hu aap se. Jaise price to price to pad gaya price sab mein pad gayi hai. Acha ye ha bas specification dalwana hai sir to koi mere se connect kar sakta hai 15-20 minute ke liye?
Executive: Specification dalwana hai.
Executive: Mai abhi thoda free hoke mai aapko connect hoke dekhta hu ek ladke ko bol ke baat karwata hu mai aapko. Hmm.
Customer: Ha Rakesh ji ko bol dijiyega ek bar connect kar lenge bhai thik hai. Wo bhi ya fir aap aap hi connect kar lenge jyada better rahega sir ek bar free hoke.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Ha thik hai. Okay sir okay.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs to increase catalog score above 80%.

- Requires more images for several products.

- Wants to add product specifications.

- Asks about current rates for decorative fountains.

- Asks about current rates for marble slabs.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to check category and PNS images.

- Executive offered to connect after getting free.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after getting free.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, images, specifications, rates, fountains
